doc.title: Daffke...! Die vier Leben der Inge D.
doc.plot: Holocaust survivor Inge Deutschkron stunned German and Israeli audiences with her memoir I Wore the Yellow Star, an account of her two years spent hiding from the Nazis in Berlin. Adapted for the stage as From Now On Your Name Is Sara, Deutschkron's story now comes to the screen in this documentary chronicling 70 years of her life and career. See also: Born in Berlin.
